definitions.definition: a happy or friendly expression on the face in which the ends of the mouth curve up slightly, often with the lips moving apart so that the teeth can be seen:
examples: Amy had a big/broad smile on her face.

definitions.definition: to make a happy or friendly expression in which the corners of your mouth curve up:
examples: He smiled and shook my hand.

definitions.definition: to express or say something with a smile:
examples: He smiled his congratulations and left without another word.
